document.full_text: in the historical drama 'triangle,' brief eyewitness accounts of the triangle shirtwaist factory fire are interspersed with a love story and tin pan alley tunes.
document.title: theater review | 'triangle': a century-old love story with fire as a backdrop
lines_and_colors: in the historical drama 'triangle,' brief eyewitness accounts of the triangle shirtwaist factory fire are interspersed with a love story and tin pan alley tunes.
